code: import React from"react";import{Container,Row,Col}from"react-bootstrap";import ProjectCard from"./ProjectCards";import{PROJECTS}from"../../Constants";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Projects(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{fluid:true,className:"project-section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{className:"project-heading",children:["My Recent ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{className:"purple",children:"Work "})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{color:"white"},children:"Here are a few projects I've worked on recently."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{style:{justifyContent:"center",paddingBottom:"10px"},children:PROJECTS.map(function(project,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{md:4,className:"project-card",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProjectCard,{imgPath:project.image,technologyUsed:project.technologyUsed,isBlog:false,title:project.name,description:project.description,link:project.url})},index);})})]})});}export default Projects;
